title: Extends forfeiture provisions to obscenity crimes
summary: Allows counties in the state to be more effective in closing stores that deal in obscene material by providing for the forfeiture of the obscene materials after conviction of any misdemeanor or felony detailed in article 235 of the penal law relating to obscenity.
